name: torrents.ru clear
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

/* ------------------------------------	*
 * Style:   torrents.ru clear    	*
 * Author:  ant[on]	        	*
 * Version: Dec 30 2008         	*
 * ------------------------------------	*
 * Dec 30 2008:			        *
 * 	- update filters                *
 * Sep 13 2008:			        *
 * 	- Ad removal            	*
 * Feb 13 2008:			        *
 * 	- Ad removal on Main page	*
 * 	+ bottom_info           	*
 * Nov 13 2007:			        *
 * 	- Ad removal on Main page	*
 * 	- Ad removal counters		*
 * Oct 15 2007:			        *
 * 	- First version	                *
 * ------------------------------------	*/

@-moz-document domain(torrents.ru) {
iframe,
EMBED,
ad.adriver.ru,
form[action="http://www.jobsmarket.ru"],
div[id="logo"],
div[id="adriver-468x60"],
div[id="adriver-240x120"],
div[id="rle-468x60"],
div[id="mg-informers"],
div[id="qle-468x60"],
div[id="looky-468x60"],
div[id="bn-nikita-1"],
div[id="bn-nikita-2"],
div[id="bn-nikita-3"],
div[id="bn-nikita-4"],
div[id="bn-nikita-5"],
div[id="glad-1"],
div[class="tCenter bCenter"],
div[class="med bold tCenter"],
div[class="tCenter"],
div[class="copyright"],
div[id="fp-banner"],
div[id="ad-all_bottom"],
div[id="ad-index_left_1"],
div[id="ad-index_left_2"],
div[id="ad-index_left_3"],
div[id="ad-index_left_4"],
div[id="idx-3"],
div[id="page_footer"],
td[class="vBottom nowrap"] {display: none !important;}
}
